Title: Provides for money upon release for certain incarcerated individuals; appropriation
Summary: Provides for eligible incarcerated individuals to receive a monthly stipend upon release from a state correctional facility.
LawCode: Add §12, Cor L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the state finance law, in relation to providing for money upon release for certain incarcerated individuals; and making an appropriation therefor
